reviews.sentence: Beautiful hotel. Beautiful hotel very good food wish there was more restaurants on the property. Our room was clean and beautiful room service breakfast was delicious although pricy. Overall it was a great stay we loved it.
We enjoyed the whole weekend. Rooms are big and comfortable.
I paid for ocean deluxe room. And I got a partial view of the ocean. I was a little disappointed that I did n’t get a full view of the ocean.
Clean spacious rooms. Great experience.
Ocean. Very relaxing and stress free. The ocean view was perfect and beautiful.

Hard Rockin. This place had a Great atmosphere that made it comfortable and relaxing. The music was from our era making it nice. All the employees we encountered were great and had good attitudes. The room was very clean and a nice layout. Food spots were good and not crazy money. I would stay here again.
The hotel is beautiful. Our room was huge and very comfortable. The fitness center was clean and had everything you could ask for.
Hard Rock. Clean room great rate nice hotel and casino.

Great hotel and location. We loved the hotel and the service we got here. Got a upgrade room with ocean view so we got so surprised and happy. We stayed 2 nights and they did not clean our bathroom between just gave us new towels and put a sticker on the toilet paper so that was not great but otherwise the hotel is great and location as well. We will be back.
It was very welcoming clean hotel the room was everything.
They need microwave in the bedroom so that u can warm up the food when it gets cold.

The staff was friendly the room was clean with two notable exceptions. When we arrived there was one bath towel in the room and we had to call to get a normal number. One of the glasses left out looked like it had been used as an ashtray in our non smoking room. The exhaust vent in the bathroom looked like it had n’t been cleaned since the Taj Mahal days.

Rooms were clean. Casino was beautiful. Check in out was fast and easy. Water temperature in room was very inconsistent. Pool was the reason we chose the hard rock hotel and was very disappointing. Overall a very mediocre experience would try somewhere else next time.

Smoke smell everywhere. Our stay was very disappointing due to the smell of smoke everywhere. We requested a non smoking room and there was a light smell when we arrived. We decided we would not be in the room much so off we went to do things we planned. The casino floor also had people smoking everywhere. We got back later that night to our room and the whole room stuck of smoke. The rooms next to us were either smoking rooms or the visitors were not adhering to the no smoking policy. Regardless we would never go back to this hotel. The staff restaurants and design were nice.

Hotel staff were excellent friendly and knowledgeable. The restaurants were great and concert at the arena wonderful as well. Room was nice but the bathroom not so much huge shower but lots of mildew in the shower several bulbs in the bathroom were out. Between those two things it really made the room feel dirty. Furniture in the room seemed older than a year old but I guess that ’s people beating up on the rooms. If the bathroom was cleaner and bulbs replaced it would have been 5 stars all the way. I usually stay at Borgata when in AC and rooms and baths are always impeccable. Hard Rock was beautiful in the common areas and we had a great time. If I knew the rooms would be up to the standards in the hotel I ’d stay there again.
Room service took over an hour and 3 phone calls to deliver a toothbrush.

Unfazed and Confused. Bathroom was a little gross with mold at the bottom of the shower on the grout as well as the metal. Mentioned it to the checkout counter person and they brushed it off. I just thought that might have been handled a little better. The parking check in walk to your room is a bit much. A tram car was almost necessary. lol. and a guide.

After spending a few days in Cape May at a beatiful 125 year old inn with an uncomfortable bed we were looking forwardto spending a night at the Hard Rock. We know the beds are comfortable there. Hurricane Dorie was hitong the shore nut we planned on taking advantage and sleeping for most of the day. We arrived early and was ableto check in right away. Unfortunately our room which was on the 37th was next to the north tower of the hard rock and the storm coming off of the shore created a wind tunnel between the two buildings. The noise coming through the window was too loud for us to be able to sleep. We called the front desk and they said they would send someone right up. 45 minutes later we called again and they said someone was on the way. 25 minutes after that I went downstairs to the concierge desk and they switched our room right away. However after an hour and a half we finally get into another room and we got the SAME exact room. Only this time on the 35th floor. As soon as we opened the door you can hear the same blowing and whistling noise as the first room. At this point I was very irritated and was ready to check out. The bellman was very nice and said he would be right back and will take care of it. 15 minutes later he came back and put us in the room opposite. Since there was not another building on that side of the hotel there was not a wind tunnel and the room was quiet. I just was not happy that it took almost three hours to resolve the problem.
Well it was ok they told us we were getting a suite did n’t happen then we had to wait to eat in the morning for like an hour nothing was open.

The casino was nice and the staff was excellent but the rooms were absolutely horrible. There was black mold on the ceilings in both rooms the carpet looked like they have never been cleaned for years and the coffee brewer had foreign debris in the water holder. I will never stay at another hard rock hotel ever again. This hotel was misrepresented on Expedia ’s site and this should have a 2 star rating. Very disappointed.
